title: Quarkus Extension Metadata
summary: This document explains the purpose and content of Quarkus extension metadata files, crucial for those developing Quarkus extensions. Key files discussed include 'quarkus-extension.yaml' for run-time metadata and 'quarkus-extension.properties' for build-specific properties. The guide details how, where, and why these files are used, alongside examples, ensuring developers can correctly package and distribute their Quarkus extensions.
